Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
SoloGame
public class Game extends EventDispatcher
This class represents a game of Masters of Renaissance. It contains the general components of the "game box", as well as some attributes shared by the players that can be easily accessed from the outside.

    • Game

      Constructor of Game instances.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of nicknames of players who joined
      devCardColors - the list of development card colors
      resourceTypes - the list of resource types
      leaderCards - the list of leader cards
      developmentCards - the list of development cards
      resContainers - the list of resource containers
      productions - the list of productions
      devCardGrid - the development card grid
      market - the resource market
      faithTrack - the faith track
      maxObtainableDevCards - the number of development cards a player can have, before triggering the end of the

  • Method Details

    • dispatchState

      public void dispatchState​(View view, Player player, boolean isMandatoryActionDone)

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      Returns whether the game is at its last round.
      Returns:
      true if the game is at its last round; false otherwise.

    • isEnded

      public boolean isEnded()
      Returns whether the game has ended.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended; false otherwise.

    • activateVaticanSections

      public void activateVaticanSections()
      Method called after a faith marker has been moved ahead, checks for available Vatican reports.

    • updatePtsFromYellowTiles

      public void updatePtsFromYellowTiles​(Player player, int advancement)

    • onDiscardResources

      public void onDiscardResources​(Player player, int quantity)
      Method called after resources have been discarded by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who has discarded resources
      quantity - the quantity of discarded resources

    • onDiscardLeader

      public void onDiscardLeader​(Player player)
      Method called after a leader card has been discarded by a player. The player receives one faith point.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who has discarded the leader card

    • onAddToDevSlot

      public void onAddToDevSlot​(int obtainedDevCards)
      Method called after a card has been bought, checks if the maximum number of buyable cards has been reached.
      Parameters:
      obtainedDevCards - the number of all development cards obtained by the player

    • onTurnEnd

      public void onTurnEnd()
      Action performed after a player ends the turn. This method appends the current player as last of the list, and gets the next (active) player from the head.

      If next player is inactive, the operation is repeated until an active player is found.

    • onPlayerSetupDone

      public void onPlayerSetupDone()
      Check if the last necessary setup move has been made.

    • isSetupDone

      public boolean isSetupDone()
      Returns:
      whether the game's setup phase is finished. The answer also depends on the players' status, inactive players are not accounted for.

    • getInkwellPlayer

      public Player getInkwellPlayer()
      Returns the player with the inkwell.
      Returns:
      the first player

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the player that has to play a turn.
      Returns:
      the current player

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Getter of all the players who joined the game at the beginning.
      Returns:
      the list of players (including who disconnected after)

    • getDevCardGrid

      public DevCardGrid getDevCardGrid()

      Returns:
      the development card grid

      Returns:
      the development card grid

      Returns:

    • getBlackPoints

      public int getBlackPoints()
      Returns Lorenzo's faith marker position.
      Returns:
      number of tile reached by Lorenzo

    • getWinnerPlayer

      public Optional<Player> getWinnerPlayer()
      Returns the player who won, if the winner is a player.
      Returns:
      the optional player

    • isBlackWinner

      public boolean isBlackWinner()
      Returns whether Lorenzo has won the game or not.
      Returns:
      true if Lorenzo is the winner of the game; false otherwise.

    • getMaxFaithPoints

      public int getMaxFaithPoints()
      Returns:
      the highest amount of faith points owned by any of the Player's game
